text: This is the first debug dialogue text.
The second debug text looks like this. If you wanted to, you can click [url=DEBUG_004]here[/url].
And this is the third debug text.
You got to the fourth debug text by clicking the text.
Judging by how many books I own, it's easy to see how smart I am.
I'll try reading one of them next week.
I hate to think about how much time I spend lying there.
Once I reach godhood, my first miracle will be to eradicate the need for sleep.
I'm too worried to do that.
